styles.background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) url("https://cromst.seongnam.go.kr:10005/images/content/street_view/bg_street_map.png") no-repeat scroll 0px 130px / auto padding-box border-box

html:
진입마당(정면) 구간 신해철 작업실 신해철 작업실 구간
(2023.12.28.까지 운영) 추모마당 구간 진입마당(후면) 구간
cssRules: .bx-wrapper .bx-loading { min-height: 50px; background: url("../images/gate/bx_loader.gif") center center no-repeat rgb(255, 255, 255); height: 100%; width: 100%; position: absolute; top: 0px; left: 0px; z-index: 2000; }
.bx-wrapper .bx-pager.bx-default-pager a { background: rgb(102, 102, 102); text-indent: -9999px; display: block; width: 18px; height: 18px; margin: 0px 5px; outline: 0px; border-radius: 18px; }
.main_con2 .bx-wrapper .bx-prev { left: 50%; margin-left: -245px; background: url("../images/gate/btn_prev2.png") 0px 0px no-repeat transparent; }
.main_con2 .bx-wrapper .bx-next { right: 50%; margin-right: -245px; background: url("../images/gate/btn_next2.png") 0px 0px no-repeat transparent; }

.bx-wrapper .bx-controls-auto .bx-start { display: block; text-indent: -9999px; width: 34px; height: 34px; outline: 0px; background: url("/images/main/btn_play1.png") left top no-repeat; margin: 0px 3px; }

.bx-wrapper .bx-controls-auto .bx-stop { display: block; text-indent: -9999px; width: 34px; height: 34px; outline: 0px; background: url("/images/main/btn_stop1.png") left top no-repeat; margin: 0px 3px; }
.bx-wrapper .bx-caption { position: absolute; bottom: 0px; left: 0px; background: rgba(80, 80, 80, 0.75); width: 100%; }
